text:
Ganenu has a nurturing and loving environment.
My daughter loves going to gan each morning. I can see how much she has progressed since she joined Ganenu.
Iâ€™m so happy with the experience she is having, truly a lovely place for a child to be.
My daughter is so happy here! She brings home Challah every Friday and is proud to celebrate Shabbat with her family! She especially loves all the painting and messy play they do throughout the day!

Ganenu provided our family with a truly memorable experience during our summer in Singapore. The staff was exceptional, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere for our child. The range of activities and the quality of education surpassed our expectations. Most importantly, our child's daily enthusiasm to attend Ganenu is a testament to the nursery's ability to make learning both fun and engaging. Highly recommended!

My Daughter had the most fun and educational summer in Ganenu!
The teachers gave so much love and patience to my daughter, and she was thrilled to go there every morning.
Great jewish education, and the best facilities you can find!

Amazing  caring staff, and modern facilities with wonderful learning through play and unique projects! my son loved attending every morning. I saw so much growth during his time there. Thank you for everything
